message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you at a special price of $1,100,000. I am confident that this offer represents a fantastic deal for both of us, ensuring you get a valuable asset at a reasonable cost while allowing me to achieve my financial goals. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.
